system: You are a helpful assistant that creates descriptive LLM Prompts for AI image generation.
user: Create an image description for the following keyword. The description will be loaded into an AI image generation tool to produce a featured image for the keyword's blog post. the image description must not have texts. the image description must be a single sentence, designed for a horizontal landscape photo, photorealistic style, anatomically correct and naturally proportioned (no distorted, malformed, unrealistic features, extra limbs, missing limbs, anatomical errors, cartoon, illustration, CGI, 3D render, painting, anime, plastic, toy, text, logos, or watermarks), professional photography quality: keyword: {{keyword}}

output-schema.name: generate_image_description
output-schema.description: Generates a single descriptive image prompt for AI image generation.

image_description.description: A detailed, descriptive prompt for AI image generation that will create a compelling featured image for the blog post. Should include visual elements, style, mood, and composition details.

image_title.description: A short, descriptive title for the generated image.
